oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sonchus arvensis - a challenge for organic farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lötjönen, T.
Vanhala, P.
Hurme, T.
Salonen, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Perennial sow-thistle (Sonchus arvensis L.) represents an increasing problem in Finland. Options for mechanical and cultural control of S. arvensis were studied in a 3 year field experiment on clay soil under organic production.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lötjönen, T.; Vanhala, P.; Hurme, T. and Salonen, J. (2005) Sonchus arvensis - a challenge for organic farming. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 1 (1), pp. 189-192.
